name: Everyone Saw These Movies Quiz | Movies Grab Bag | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the movie 'Big', name either one of the songs played on the floor piano?
questions.explanation:
Chopsticks & Heart And Soul.

	"Chopsticks" or "Heart And Soul", are played by the big keyboard.

questions.text: In the movie 'Armageddon', there are two space shuttles. One is the Independence. What is the name of the other one?
Sidney Prescott is the name of a character in which movie?
options: I Know What You Did Last Summer
